name: Idle Golf
description:
Train the Best Golfers in the World and get RICH doing it!
Tap, Upgrade & Get RICH!
Train Golfers & Build the World's Best Driving Range!

FEATURES:
* Manage a driving range & earn CASH!
* Hire coaches to automate money collection!
* Upgrade Golf tees to gain a LARGE boost to income!
* Manage up to 8 golfers at once!
* Earn trophies to gain a permanent boost to income!

Play the #1 Idle Golf Game for FREE! Download Now!
